title: Thalavali Lyrics
stanzas:
kedi lady thallipodi
neethan ennoda thalavali
mental aagi ponen naane
adichathu ellaame eranguthadi

ah kaanja karuvaadaa en lifea
maathivittaa
adi kanna moodiyum thoonga vidaama
kaadha pothavittaa

enna inga vandhu niruthi
en nenja thinna oruthi
ava sonna vaartha ellaam nambi
naanum nadu roatil ninnen

thinam thinam un thollai
enaku ini than illa
kedi neethaan en thalavali
enakkuthaan ulla feelinglaam illa
tata bye bye di thalavali

thalavali thalavali

ye poadi nee venaandi
ellaam en thalavithi

nee en thalavali ayyo en thalavali
